content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Mining and Smelting Complex at (-28, -61)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (-28, -61)
- Wooden chest at (-27.5, -59.5)
- Burner inserter at (-26.5, -59.5)
- Stone furnace at (-25, -59)
- Burner inserter at (-23.5, -58.5)
- Storage chest at (-22.5, -58.5) containing iron plates and copper plates

### Iron Mining and Smelting Complex at (-18, -53)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (-18, -53)
- Wooden chest at (-17.5, -51.5)
- Burner inserter at (-16.5, -51.5)
- Stone furnace at (-15, -51)
- Burner inserter at (-13.5, -50.5)
- Storage chest at (-12.5, -50.5) containing iron plates

### Copper Mining Setup at (41, -82)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (41, -82)
- Wooden chest at (41.5, -80.5)
- Burner inserter at (41.5, -79.5)

### Science Pack Production at (8.5, 13.5)
Consists of:
- Assembling machine at (8.5, 13.5)
- Input chest at (5.5, 13.5)
- Burner inserter at (6.5, 13.5)
- Output chest at (11.5, 13.5)
- Burner inserter at (10.5, 13.5)
- Stone furnace at (14, 14)
- Connected by belt groups for material transport

### Power Generation System
Consists of:
- Steam engine at (-4.5, 12.5)
- Boiler at (-4.5, 16)
- Offshore pump at (-3.5, 27.5)
- Connected by multiple pipe groups for water transport
- Electrical network connecting various entities (ID: 12502)

ERROR TIPS

### Errors when trying to place lab at occupied positions
- Check if the target position is clear of other entities before placing the lab
- Try different positions if the intended spot is occupied
- Current attempts at positions (8.5, 13.5), (8.5, 12.5), (8.5, 15.5) all failed due to existing objects

### Errors when trying to access non-existent lab
- Ensure the lab is successfully placed before trying to interact with it
- Verify the correct position of the lab before attempting to access it

### Resource insertion errors
- Verify you have the required items in inventory before attempting to insert them
- Current issues with copper plates and coal insertion due to missing resources

### Power system issues
- Keep coal supply in boiler maintained to ensure continuous power generation
- Monitor fuel levels in burner devices to prevent "out of fuel" states
